blocks.speaker: priest
blocks.english: Holy.

blocks.speaker: congregation
blocks.geez: እግዚአብሔር ቅዱስ ኃያል ቅዱስ ሕያው ዘኢይመውት ዘተወልደ እማርያም እምቅድስት ድንግል ተሣሃለነ እግዚኦ።
blocks.amharic: እግዚአብሔር፣ ቅዱስ ኃያል ቅዱስ ሕያው የማይሞት፤ ከቅድስት ድንግል ማርያም የተወለደ፣ አቤቱ ይቅር በለን።
blocks.english: God, Holy Mighty, Holy Living Immortal, who was born from the holy Virgin Mary, have mercy upon us, Lord.
blocks.transliteration: Igzee'abihér, qidus hayal qidus hiyaw ze'eeyimewit zetewelde iMariam imqidist dingil tesahalene igzee'o.

blocks.speaker: congregation
blocks.geez: ቅዱስ እግዚአብሔር ቅዱስ ኃያል ቅዱስ ሕያው ዘኢይመውት ዘተጠምቀ በዮርዳኖስ ወተሰቅለ ዲበ ዕፀ መስቀል። ተሣሃለነ እግዚኦ።
blocks.amharic: ቅዱስ እግዚአብሔር፣ ቅዱስ ኃያል ቅዱስ ሕያው የማይሞት፤ በዮርዳኖስ የተጠመቀ፣ በመስቀል ላይ የተሰቀለ አቤቱ ይቅር በለን።
blocks.english: Holy God, Holy Mighty, Holy Living Immortal, who was baptized in Jordan and crucified on the tree of the cross, have mercy upon us, Lord.
blocks.transliteration: Qidus Igzee'abiher qidus hayal qidus hiyaw ze'iymewit zeteTemqe beYordanos weteseqle deebe itSe mesqel tesahalene igzio.

blocks.speaker: congregation
blocks.geez: ቅዱስ እግዚአብሔር ቅዱስ ኃያል ቅዱስ ሕያው ዘኢይመውት ዘተንሥአ እሙታን አመ ሣልስት ዕለት ዐርገ በስብሐት ውስተ ሰማያት ወነበረ በየማነ አቡሁ ዳግመ ይመጽእ በስብሐት ይኰንን ሕያዋነ ወሙታነ ተሣሃለነ እግዚኦ።
blocks.amharic: ቅዱስ እግዚአብሔር፣ ቅዱስ ኃያል ቅዱስ ሕያው የማይሞት፤ በሦስተኛው ቀን ከሙታን ተለይቶ የተነሣ፣ በክብር በምስጋና ወደ ሰማይ የወጣ፣ በአባቱ ቀኝ የተቀመጠ፣ በሕያዋንና በሙታን ይፈርድ ዘንድ ዳግመኛ በጌትነት ይመጣል አቤቱ ይቅር በለን።
blocks.english: Holy God, Holy Mighty, Holy Living Immortal, who did rise from the dead on the third day, ascended into heaven in glory, and sits at the right hand of the Father, and wilt come again in glory to judge the quick and the dead, have mercy upon us, Lord.
blocks.transliteration: Qidus Igzee'abihér qidus hayal qidus hiyaw ze'eeyimewit zetensi'a imutan ame salist ilet, arge besibihat wiste semayat wenebere beyemane abuhu, dagime yimets'i besibhat yikwonin hiyawane wemutane tesahalene igzee'o.

blocks.speaker: congregation
blocks.geez: ስብሐት ለአብ ስብሐት ለወልድ ስብሐት ለመንፈስ ቅዱስ
blocks.amharic: ለአብ ምስጋና ለወልድ ምስጋና፣ ለመንፈስ ቅዱስ ምስጋና
blocks.english: Glory be to the Father, glory be to the Son, glory be to the Holy Spirit,
blocks.transliteration: Sibhat le'Ab sibhat leWeld sibhat leMenfes Qidus

blocks.speaker: congregation
blocks.geez: ይእዜኒ ወዘልፈኒ ለዓለመ ዓለም አሜን ወአሜን ለይኩን፣ ለይኩን።
blocks.amharic: ዛሬም፣ ዘወትርም ለዘለዓለም እውነት በእውነት ይሁን፣ ይሁን።
blocks.english: both now and ever and world without end. Amen and Amen, so be it, so be it.
blocks.transliteration: Yi'izénee wezelfenee wele'alem alem amen we'amen leyikun leyikun.

blocks.speaker: congregation
blocks.amharic: በሦስትነት ያለህ ቅዱስ ሕያው እግዚአብሔር ሆይ! ይቅር በለን።
blocks.english: O Holy Trinity, living God have mercy upon us.

blocks.speaker: priest
blocks.english: Glory be to God.

blocks.speaker: congregation
blocks.english: It is right, it is just.
As the priest reads the "O Lord, maker of all…" Prayer of the Covenant:

blocks.speaker: congregation
blocks.english: Oh Lord, we glorify Thee.
As the priest reads the "O God of light…" Prayer of the Covenant:

blocks.speaker: congregation
blocks.english: Oh Lord, we praise Thee.
After the priest finishes the "Thrice over…" Prayer of the Covenant:

blocks.speaker: congregation
blocks.english: Amen.

blocks.speaker: priest
blocks.english: The grace of God be with you.

blocks.speaker: congregation
blocks.english: And with Thy spirit.

blocks.speaker: priest
blocks.english: Let us glorify our God.

blocks.speaker: congregation
blocks.english: It is right, it is just.

blocks.speaker: priest
blocks.english: Strengthen the thought of your heart.

blocks.speaker: congregation
blocks.geez: ብነ ኀበ እግዚአብሔር አቡነ ዘበሰማያት፣ አቡነ ዘበሰማያት፣
blocks.amharic: በእግዚአብሔር ዘንድ አለን። አባታችን ሆይ! አባታችን ሆይ!
blocks.english: We lift them unto the Lord our God. Our Father who art in heaven, Our Father who art in heaven,
blocks.transliteration: Bine habe Igzee'abihér abune zebesemayat, abune zebesemayat,

blocks.speaker: congregation
blocks.geez: አቡነ ዘበሰማያት ኢታብአነ እግዚኦ ውስተ መንሱት።
blocks.amharic: አባታችን ሆይ! አቤቱ ወደ ፈተና አታግባን።
blocks.english: Our Father who art in heaven, lead us not into temptation.
blocks.transliteration: Abune zebesemayat, eetabi'ane igzee'o wiste mensut.

blocks.english: As the priest reads the "O God the Father…" Prayer of the Covenant:

blocks.speaker: congregation
blocks.english: Oh Lord, we glorify Thee.
As the priest reads the "O Lord, Jesus Christ…" Prayer of the Covenant:

blocks.speaker: congregation
blocks.english: Oh Lord, we praise Thee.
After the priest finishes the "Thrice over…" Prayer of the Covenant:

blocks.speaker: congregation
blocks.english: Amen.

blocks.speaker: priest
blocks.english: The grace of God be with you.

blocks.speaker: congregation
blocks.english: And with Thy spirit.

blocks.speaker: priest
blocks.english: Give ye thanks unto Our God.

blocks.speaker: congregation
blocks.english: It is right, it is just.
As the priest reads the "O immortal Father, Saviour of our soul…" Prayer of the Covenant:

blocks.speaker: congregation
blocks.english: We glorify Thee, O Lord.
As the priest reads the "We praise Thee, O Lord…" Prayer of the Covenant:

blocks.speaker: congregation
blocks.english: We praise Thee, O Lord.
After the priest finishes the "Thrice over…" Prayer of the Covenant:

blocks.speaker: congregation
blocks.english: Amen.
